title: 1943–44 Taça de Portugal
text: The 1943–44 Taça de Portugal was the sixth season of the <a href="Ta%C3%A7a%20de%20Portugal">Taça de Portugal</a> (English: "Portuguese Cup"), the premier Portuguese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="single-elimination%20tournament">knockout</a> competition, organized by the <a href="Portuguese%20Football%20Federation">Portuguese Football Federation</a> (FPF). <a href="S.L.%20Benfica">Benfica</a> was the defending champion and played <a href="G.D.%20Estoril%20Praia">Estoril</a> in the final on 28 May 1944.
